reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: Bought this a little over a year ago and it worked great until recently. The bulb started flickering so I thought the bulb was going bad so I replaced it and that didn't fix the issue. I read about the 3 operating modes and I tried all 3. Mode 2 has the least flicker, but it still flickers. The switch was great while it worked- never had wifi issues or anything, it was very responsive and worked well, but now I'm going to have to replace it after 15 months.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2025
reviews.title: Worked until it didn't

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I really wanted to like these switches. They do exactly what they're advertised to do, and they do it well. After using them for a few months, I've decided I don't like how touchy the dimmer function is. It's not a physical slider, you slide your finger up and down the center to dim the lights. The problem is, to keep from dimming the lights every time you turn the light on or off, you have to press at the very bottom. I try to remember, but every other type of light switch requires no forethought other than turning it on or off, and that's what I'm used to. If they had a lockout feature for the dimmer, I wouldn't have a problem. I'm going to to replace them with plain old smart switches and upgrade my Led's to smart lights.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2025
reviews.title: Very touchy

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: This Dimmer Switch is a fantastic addition to any smart home setup. Installation is straightforward, making it accessible even for those who aren't particularly tech-savvy. The switches integrate seamlessly with Alexa and Google Home, allowing for convenient voice control to adjust your lighting effortlessly. One of the standout features is the TREATLIFE app, which provides additional customization options. You can set schedules, create lighting scenes, and adjust brightness levels, all from your smartphone. This flexibility enhances the overall user experience, making it easy to create the perfect ambiance for any occasion. Another great aspect is that you don’t have to connect it to Wi-Fi for it to function. This means you can use it like a regular light switch, which is perfect for households where not everyone wants to engage with smart technology. Even without the smart features enabled, the switch operates effectively and reliably, ensuring your lights can be controlled as usual. The dimmer function works smoothly, allowing for precise control over lighting levels, which is particularly nice for creating a cozy atmosphere in living spaces or dining areas. Overall, it's offers a great value for upgrading your home lighting while providing the flexibility of smart features when you want them. It’s a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to enhance their smart home experience!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2025
reviews.title: Easy to install and set up

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I was trying to make my house smarter, and individual bulbs were not cost effective for me. Instead, I installed a number of these to control the lights. Sync easily to Alexa, allowing me to control which lights turn on, and when. Easily installed and look great on the wall!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2025
reviews.title: Works great!

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: Loved this product until I upgraded my iPhone to iOS 18 and lost ability to use widgets for these switches. This makes management of light switches from my phone much more difficult than it needs to be. It’s been almost 6 months and still no indication from vendor if they’re ever going to resolve this issue. Considering replacing all of my light switches with a product from a company that is interested in keeping up with technology. This is, after all, supposedly a ”smart” switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2025
reviews.title: No Widget in iOS 18

reviews.text: I love the look of these but honestly the reliability of the connection leaves so much to be desired. I have kasa switches that I've yet to have to reconnect. Cannot say the same for this brand. I have their bulbs and a couple dimmer switches and I've had to reconnect only Treatlife branded smart devices. Unreliable cheap crap.

reviews.text: It is good if you are not running many different brands of items. I have a home assistant instance that can not use these so i cant have it talk to the rest of my ecosystem. If i was only using these switches then it would be exactly what I want. Good tough feedback and easy use and install.

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I have several of smart Treatlife single and 3 way switches installed and all work fine. Wanted to swap a single pole to get a smart dimmer. Ordered first and installed correctly (used amp meter to check) and it did not work. Returned for another (thinking my bad luck) land installed again correctly per directions again using amp meter to make sure. Did not work... after i clamed down I REVERSED load and line wires and it now works fine. Major problem with paper instructions and labels on the switch wires. I noted that Amazon said Often Returned, now the reason is clear. They shot themselves in the food with crappy instructions.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
reviews.title: Works - bad direction

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I checked out several options in the store for functionality and aesthetics and this dimmer switch is simply the best. Actually, I took a chance buying this on Amazon and not being able to try it out first. But, one of the options I was hoping for but wasn't sure about was can you touch (not press as in button press) the button and slide your finger up or down to set the dimmer. And, yes you can. It is a capacitance touch to set the dimmer. To turn it on and off simply press the bottom of the switch and it will turn on/off. Interestingly, you can set the dimmer level without the light being on. It has several LEDs on the switch that light as you slide your finger. I didn't really need the APP control but that is nifty if you want to control with your phone. I simply love this switch and will be buying a couple more.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2024
reviews.title: Probably the best dimmer switch I've seen!

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: TreatLife has been the best, and has only gotten better. Rock-solid reliability, ease of installation and the updated pairing process, is second to none. Have been using TreatLife in two houses for at least the last 5-6 years. The old method of pairing would have the extra step of the switch broadcasting a temporary WiFi network, then would shift to the house WiFi. Now, by the time you hit the “+” in the SmartLife app, the device has already been discovered, and after you have one device already connected in the app, you no longer have to select your network and input the credentials. It’s the little things that make the difference.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024
reviews.title: Best Smart Switch Available

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I bought a 4-pack of Treatlife single pole switches and 1 Treatlife dimmer. They worked fine, pairing with the Tuya app and working through Tuya with Home Assistant. All 4 of the single pole switches died within 2 years. The dimmer failed after 4 years. In all cases, they wouldn't connect to the app, and trying to turn the switch on manually failed. The LEDs on the switch would just flicker. When electronics are built with very cheap components, they just don't last. I expect things like light switches to be functional long-term.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2024
reviews.title: Very short life

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. It's a game changer. It works extraordinarily well with the Alexa app and I really like how you can change so many settings to work with different types of LED bulbs. I removed one star because the push button action is kind of a pain in the butt. Remembers the previous setting but if you touch the touch sensor then it might adjust that setting. Then you have to readjust it and then sometimes when you're trying to turn the light on or off it adjusts the setting again. That aside, if you just plan to use Alexa to control it, it works flawlessly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024
reviews.title: Working great so far

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: Never had an issue with WiFi operation. Dimmer and scheduling work well even when outside the home network. 'HOWEVER....... 'Did not like the manual on/off button. It never did work 100% of the time. Minus one star. Eventually got to where at 1.5 years the on/off button no longer worked. Minus another star. 'Did not like the manual dimmer control. Very difficult to make small adjustments. Minus another star. Many people seem to like this switch, which is why I bought it. My own experience was mostly negative and I can not recommend it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2024
reviews.title: Quit working at 1.5 years

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I bought several of these for the dimming function. I do not use the smart function at all. They are so-so as far as dimming, but only dim to about 60% if you are using LED bulbs. My biggest complaint is the "on off" function. As these age I have to press harder and harder to get them to turn on or off. Eventually they will not work at all. Also they are squishy...not good tactile feedback when pressing on/off button. I have been replacing with GHome brand and seem to be having better results.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.title: Not reliable, keep having to replace. Bad tactile feeling.

reviews.title: Easy Install and works well with Google Home

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: As a dimming switch, the product works great, looks modern, and is intuitive to use. As a smart switch, it’s very terrible. Their app experience is poor and something has simple as logging in is painful. Most people will just connect them to their Alexa, Google or Apple homes however that is also glitchy. On google all my TreatLife products show as “offline”. So controlling them with your voice flat out does not work. Their software systems seem to just be poorly maintained. If you’re in the market for smart switches I highly recommend you find zigbee or matter products. These connect to a server (hub) in your home instead of a server in China. You’ll get more privacy, security, and can still hook the hub up to the internet and control them with Google, Siri, Alexa. But this way your data is only exposed to US big tech instead of both US companies and shady Chinese companies
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.title: A good switch but not a good “smart” switch

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
reviews.text: I have been buying this brand for the various remodels I have done for homes over the last 4 years. I had minimal and fixable communication and flicker issues that were annoying, but eventually sovable. Now, they either cheapened the parts or the batch of 20 (yes 20) or more are a disaster. Flickering, one room turning on another room, total inconsistent phone adaptability and a few thousand spent on trying to figure it out with my certified electrician. Customer service was initially responsive but then the passed me off the tech support...IN CHINA...VIA EMAIL ONLY. That is an impossible feat. They have a two year warranty, but my efforts to have it honored are moot. I want the money back (hundreds of dollars) so I can buy a proper switch/dimmers. I do not need a replacement for them, I already spend time swapping this location for that as well as removing them from the WiFi etc. The fact that I am having the issue accross the board on almost all of the units indicates that replacements are a further investment in installation that at this point would be an unreasonable solution. So I am stuck eating all costs involved and replacing for the homeowner. I will continue to review the many many units I have purchased from this company until they decide to refund me my purchases within the last two years.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.title: Major Flicker Issues Zero Resolution

reviews.productTitle: TREATLIFE Smart Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole Smart Switch for Dimmable Bulbs, 2.4GHz WiFi Smart Light Switch Works with Alexa and Google Home, APP Remote Control, Neutral Wire Required
